description: Jack Della Maddalena says it was an "easy decision" to swap a fight with Leon Edwards for Belal Muhammad.
title: UFC: Jack Della Maddalena says swapping Leon Edwards fight for Belal Muhammad 'easy decision'
title_page: UFC: Jack Della Maddalena says swapping Leon Edwards fight for Belal Muhammad 'easy decision' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Australian Jack Della Maddalena said it was an "easy decision" to cancel his fight with Leon Edwards and fight UFC welterweight champion Belal Muhammad instead.
The 28-year-old Della Maddalena was booked to headline alongside Briton Edwards at UFC London on 22 March, but will now challenge for the UFC title on 10 May instead.
Edwards remains at the top of UFC London, fighting American Sean Brady instead.
"I was ready to go, big fight [against Leon Edwards]," said Della Maddalena at a news conference on Wednesday.
"Bit of a change in opponent but I am pretty confident I can get the win. I'm ready to tackle the next few weeks, sharpen the tools and come in the best version of myself.
